resources.string: Alarms will follow the phones Low Power Mode, this may cause alarms not to go off.
Alarms will follow the phones Do not Disturb setting, this may cause alarms not to go off.

How aggressive the user's movement should be to prevent the alarm from triggering. Below are examples of each level: 

High = Walking 
Medium = Phone is held by hand but user is stationary. 
Low = Phone is on bed and user is tossing and turning.
The overall length of the time in which the phone has to detect intermittent motion for it to determine if the user won\'t go back to sleep and thus disable motion monitoring
The length of time wherein if the phone does not pickup any user movement, the alarm will go off again.
Alarm will go off soon. No motion detected.
Activity monitoring will go off in %1$d second(s). Press button to disable activity monitoring.
